name: Hubic
description: Store files on your OVH Hubic repository.

refresh_token.name: Refresh token
refresh_token.description: Token used to authenticate with Hubic (retrieved with get_refresh_token.py)

changes_timer.name: Changes Timer
changes_timer.description: Time between each change check. In seconds.

client_id.name: Application Hubic ID
client_id.description: The ID used to generate the Hubic token.

client_secret.name: Application Hubic Secret
client_secret.description: The secret used to generate the Hubic token.
